name: StellarEchoes:Maze Shooter
description:
There are 7 installments in the Stellar Echoes series, each with a different gameplay. StellarEchoes:MazeShooter is one of the sequels, where the player travels to a target planet as a new recruit of the Star Authority, and has to go through a large abandoned labyrinth to complete a crazy matchmaking battle and earn an achievement medal. This time around, we've reworked and upgraded the Lightship spacecraft under the URP rendering pipeline for a smoother experience and more realistic scenes. The gameplay has also been greatly updated, completely abandoning the level maps of the EA version.
StellarEchoes:MazeShooter is more special, after the player enters the maze, you need to think and observe calmly, and we have given the player a very open idea in the design of the maze, there can be many ways to pass through the maze, and inexplicable assassin-type monsters will suddenly appear in the maze, defeat them, go to the central tower, where a very interesting creature is waiting for you. Grab your medal of wisdom.
By the way, in the spaceship where the player is, there is a little game hidden, go and find out.
